sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { RequestService } from 'src/app/core/services/request.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-requestform', templateUrl: './requestform.component.html', styleUrls: ['./requestform.component.css'] }) export class RequestformComponent { request = { type: '', startDate: '', endDate: '', justification: '' }; constructor(private requestService: RequestService) {} submitRequest() { this.requestService.createRequest(this.request).subscribe(response => { console.log('Demande soumise avec succès', response); }); } }
